Docs.param: The for the current turn of conversation.
Docs.returns: true if the activity is valid, false if not.
Docs.remarks: Override this method to implement a custom validator for the activity being sent during the . This method can be used to ignore activities of a certain type if needed. If this method returns false, the dialog will end the turn without processing the activity.
